      • createModel

        public cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel createModel(String path,
                                              String purpose,
                                              String specify,
                                              int numTopics,
                                              int numWords)
        Specified by:
        createModel in interface Lda
        numTopics - - Number of topics from which a document is composed
        numWords - - Number of Words shown in a topic (from the implementation its one lower)
        Returns:
        - Topic Model trained with the specific parameters alphaSum = 50.0 (alpha = alphaSum/numTopics) beta = 0.01 ( beta = 1/numTopics

      • TopicInferencer

        public double[] TopicInferencer(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel trainedModel,
                       String path,
                       String purpose,
                       String specify,
                       String docID)
                         throws IOException
        Specified by:
        TopicInferencer in interface Lda
        docID - - specifies the id of document in the format found on db.
        Returns:
        Array of doubles specifying the percentage of "appearance" of that topic[i] on this document The document is entered as a new instance on the existing vocabulary and uses the trained model
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getTopicDocument

        public HashMap<String,String> getTopicDocument(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m,
                                      int docID,
                                      int max,
                                      double threshold,
                                      int numTopics,
                                      int numWords)
        Specified by:
        getTopicDocument in interface Lda
        docID - - integer referring to instance (from InstanceList) responsible for that document
        max - - specifies the maximal number of topics generated for a corpus
        threshold - - minimal topic distribution allowed to be considered significant of a document
        Returns:
        - A HashMap where key: TopicID as String (used later to be mapped to db-version id) value: Bag of words for that topic

      • getTopicWeight

        public HashMap<String,Double> getTopicWeight(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m,
                                    int docID,
                                    int max,
                                    double threshold,
                                    int numTopics,
                                    int numWords)
        Specified by:
        getTopicWeight in interface Lda
        Returns:
        A HashMap where key: TopicID as String (used later to be mapped to db-version id) value: Double specified the % of assignment of that topic to specific document

      • getAllDocumentTopics

        public HashMap<String,List<String>> getAllDocumentTopics(cc.mallet.topics.ParallelTopicModel m,
                                                int docID,
                                                int max,
                                                double threshold,
                                                int numTopics)
        Specified by:
        getAllDocumentTopics in interface Lda
        Returns:
        A HashMap where key: TopicID as String (used later to be mapped to db-version id) value: List of Strings specifying topic ID "-" % of assignment of that topic to specific document Idea: Get all the significant topics for a specific document
